message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $15,000, which reflects the true value of this item.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I'm willing to go that high. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
